duties_responsibilities.duty: Bookeeping, invoices, AP, AR, month-end support, etc.
Automate processes and improve existing processes to streamline efficiency.
Analyze and manipulate data for custom reporting processes and invoicing.
Post journal entries for accrued expenses and revenue.
Work closely with various expense managers to ensure accurate month-end accruals are submitted timely.
Gathering and production of monthly reconciliation binder.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance
